name: Hidden Shelter
storyline: The game's story is about three friends who after a sudden white flash on the road got into an accident. Their car crashed. After waking up, Charles and Bernard lose sight of Diego. Diego is Bernard's older brother and friend of Charles who drove the car. Desperate with the strange noise in the woods, Charles decides to go out for help, even though he doesn't believe that Diego was still alive. Bernard, on the other hand, does not want to leave his brother behind and believes that he managed to escape. The two leave for a mansion in the forest in search of their lost friend and at the same time need to stay alive by running away from a sinister creature that inhabits the place.
summary: Hidden Shelter is a first-person horror game, focused on exploration, developed by the White Vortex studio. It is under development on the Unreal Engine for Windows PC. Explore the area in search of clues and escape from a bloodthirsty being who wants to kill all those who approach the place.
